original_text: ‘Nebuchadnezzar, King of Babylon, is attacking us. Please ask the Lord to help us. Perhaps he will do a powerful miracle as he has done for us in the past. Perhaps he will cause Nebuchadnezzar to go away and leave us alone.’
korean_text: 바벨론의 느부갓네살 왕이 우리를 치니 청컨대 너는 우리를 위하여 여호와께 간구하라 여호와께서 혹시 그의 모든 기적으로 우리를 도와 행하시면 그가 우리를 떠나리라 하니

sentences.original_text: Nebuchadnezzar, King of Babylon, is attacking us
sentences.korean_translation: 바벨론 왕 느부갓네살이 우리를 공격하고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: Please ask the Lord to help us
Perhaps he will do a powerful miracle
sentences.korean_translation: 아마도 그분은 강력한 기적을 행하실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: as he has done for us in the past
Perhaps he will cause Nebuchadnezzar to go away
sentences.korean_translation: 아마도 그분은 느부갓네살이 떠나가게 하실 것입니다
